explains: n. 圣地；神殿；神龛；圣祠
vt. 将……置于神龛内；把……奉为神圣

sentences.en: Wimbledon is a shrine for all lovers of tennis.
sentences.cn: 温布尔登是所有网球爱好者的圣地。

sentences.en: The monument has been turned into a shrine to the dead and the missing.
sentences.cn: 这座纪念碑已经变成了纪念那些过世或失踪的人的圣地。

sentences.en: Father Mushtaq Pyara expressed concern as devotees prepare for the 62nd pilgrimage to the National Marian Shrine in Mariamabad.
sentences.cn: 朝圣者准备参与第六十二届默里亚巴德玛丽安圣殿的朝圣之旅，对此穆尔塔克·皮亚拉（Mushtaq Pyara）神父表示担忧。
